Articles.Content:
hay all, been trying to get the B9 mod installed since .22 and everything it makes the game crash when ever i enter the VAB. and the same again in .23

i know its still not been updated for .23 yet, but after watching Scotts interplanetary Videos on youtube it seems it dose still work in .23

any idea why my version is not working?

thank you

It's probably causing you to run out of memory, it's fairly harsh like that. The mod itself works fine.

Try adding the lowres texture pack for B9, likewise for any other large parts packs you have installed (Kw rocketry and novapunch being another couple memory-munching beasties).

i have KW installed and that works fine, but even on a fresh install with no other mods it still crashes, i have 16gb memory, i know its only 32bit so even 4gb should be enough to run the mod solo surly?

its ok i fixed it finally, i looked into the other thing for lower textures, didnt see it in the install folder, put it across and its working, cant beleive i missed that hehe, thank you anyway now back off into space with new stuffs. need more SCIENCE!!!!
